subject: junit with ant
messageBody:
Hi

I am fairly new to junit with ants

I have to run a junit task and facing some issues

My junit is

public class AllServerLibraryTests {

/**
* This is the suite method for classes in the
* TokensServerLibrary project
* @return Test
*/
public static Test suite() {


TestSuite suite =
new TestSuite("Test for TokensServerLibrary");
//$JUnit-BEGIN$
suite.addTest(AllTests.suite());
suite.addTest(com.rbsg.tokens.server.common.audit.dao.implementation.AllTests.suite());
suite.addTest(com.rbsg.tokens.server.common.audit.dao.mapper.AllTests.suite());
suite.addTest(com.rbsg.tokens.server.common.configuration.loader.AllTests.suite());
suite.addTest(com.rbsg.tokens.server.common.dao.AllTests.suite());

//$JUnit-END$
return suite;
}


The ant script is

<!-- ============================= -->
<!-- test latest version of source -->
<!-- ============================= -->
<target name="test" unless="notest" description="Run the unit tests.">
<mkdir dir="${build.reports.dir}"/>
<junit printsummary="yes"
fork="yes"
errorProperty="test.failed"
failureProperty="test.failed">

<classpath>
<fileset dir="${was4.home}/lib">
<include name="*.jar" />
</fileset>
</classpath>
<formatter type="brief" usefile="false" />
<test name="${testcase}" if="testcase"/>
<batchtest todir="${build.reports.dir}" unless="testcase">
<fileset dir="${test.classes.dir}"
includes="**/*Test.class"
excludes="**/*Tests.class"
/>
</batchtest>
</junit>


<fail if="test.failed">
First run of unit testing failed. Check log or reports for details
</fail>

where
testcase=D:\\code\\TokensServerLibrary\\src\\javatest\\com\\rbsg\\tokens\\server\\common\\test\\AllServerLibraryTests
dist.dir= dist
dist.docs.dir= ${dist.dir}\\docs
test.classes.dir=D:\\code\\TokensServerLibrary\\classes\\com\\rbsg\\tokens\\server\\common\\test



The exception i get is

Buildfile: C:\trial\BuildEars\build.xml

test:
[echo] **1**
[junit] Running D:\code\TokensServerLibrary\src\javatest\com\rbsg\tokens\server\common\test\AllServerLibraryTests
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec
[junit] Testsuite: D:\code\TokensServerLibrary\src\javatest\com\rbsg\tokens\server\common\test\AllServerLibraryTests
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec
[junit]
[junit] Null Test: Caused an ERROR
[junit] D:\code\TokensServerLibrary\src\javatest\com\rbsg\tokens\server\common\test\AllServerLibraryTests
[junit] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: D:\code\TokensServerLibrary\src\javatest\com\rbsg\tokens\server\common\test\AllServerLibraryTests
[junit] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:241)
[junit] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:516)
[junit] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:460)
[junit] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:448)
[junit] at java.lang.Class.forName1(Native Method)
[junit] at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:142)
[junit]
[junit]
[junit] TEST D:\code\TokensServerLibrary\src\javatest\com\rbsg\tokens\server\common\test\AllServerLibraryTests FAILED
[fail] BUILD FAILED: file:C:/trial/BuildEars/build.xml:50:
First run of unit testing failed. Check log or reports for details

Total time: 3 seconds



PLEASE HELP



Thanks

Ridvan
